name: Smith
tagline: You solve problems in metal. Defense, tools, and battlefield pragmatism.

perks.label: Hardened Build
perks.desc: +1 Morale when danger rises; Wounds reduced in travel ambushes.

perks.label: Field Repairs
perks.desc: Choice options sometimes gain a 'repair' solution for better outcomes.

name: Leatherworker
tagline: You weave strength into hides and straps. Quiet resilience, travel survival.

perks.label: Quiet Steps
perks.desc: Lower Suspicion in stealth / scouting choices.

perks.label: Patchwork
perks.desc: Small Wounds can be stabilized without supply loss.

name: Relicator
tagline: If you’ve seen a wondrous thing, you can echo it. Magic with rules… and loopholes.

perks.label: Arcane Echo
perks.desc: Occasionally convert Supplies loss into Suspicion gain instead.

perks.label: Warding Tricks
perks.desc: One 'prevent death' event per run if Wounds are not extreme.

name: Alchemist
tagline: Concoctions, catalysts, and controlled chaos. Your lab is a suitcase.

perks.label: Field Medicine
perks.desc: Wounds reduced after camp if Supplies ≥ 5.

perks.label: Volatile Solutions
perks.desc: Big swings: some choices grant huge payoff with risk.

name: Architect / Builder
tagline: You read space like a spell. Bridges, shelters, fortifications, secrets in stone.

perks.label: Sheltercraft
perks.desc: Camp choices can boost Morale without costing Supplies.

perks.label: Route Planning
perks.desc: Reduce travel penalties; improve success in 'hold position' scenes.

name: Historian / Chronicler
tagline: You collect the truth—sometimes against its will. Names, dates, motives.

perks.label: Read People
perks.desc: Extra dialogue options that lower Suspicion or raise Morale.

perks.label: Truth Seeker
perks.desc: Better outcomes when investigating league corruption.

name: Cartographer
tagline: You turn the unknown into lines and legend. The road confesses to you.

perks.label: Shortcuts
perks.desc: Sometimes trade time for Supplies: reduce Supplies loss on travel.

perks.label: Weather Eye
perks.desc: Avoid Wounds in storms and aerial encounters more often.

name: Quartermaster
tagline: Logistics is war by other means. You keep people alive with planning.

perks.label: Rationing
perks.desc: Supplies drain slower; camp can restore Morale at low cost.

perks.label: Barter
perks.desc: Better village trade outcomes; supplies gains are bigger.

name: Information Broker
tagline: You sniff out the league’s rot. Contacts, debts, secrets, leverage.

perks.label: Contacts
perks.desc: Lower Suspicion in cities; unlock safehouses.

perks.label: Leverage
perks.desc: In Act 2, can redirect danger toward hired muscle (affects who dies).

name: Bard
tagline: You move hearts—and crowds. Stories are weapons; songs are locks and keys.

perks.label: Camp Anthem
perks.desc: Camp restores Morale more; can prevent panic choices.

perks.label: Spotlight
perks.desc: High visibility: higher Suspicion risk, but better social gains.
